data_description.url: Server url starting with the protocol (http or https)

remove_value_template.title: The {domain} integration cannot start
remove_value_template.description:
Configuring {domain} using YAML is being removed and the `{parameter}` parameter cannot be imported.

Please remove `{parameter}` from your `{domain}` yaml configuration and restart Home Assistant

Alternatively, you may entirely remove the `{domain}` configuration from your configuration.yaml, restart Home Assistant, and add the {domain} integration manually.

missing_include_only_feed_id.title: No feed synchronized with the {domain} sensor
missing_include_only_feed_id.description:
Configuring {domain} using YAML is being removed.

Please add manually the feeds you want to synchronize with the `configure` button of the integration.
